item.title: How to Configure Alerting on Ingress-NGINX in Kubernetes
item.description: In this blog post, we will be discussing how to set up monitoring and alerting for Nginx ingress in a Kubernetes environment. We will cover the installation and configuration of ingress-nginx, Prometheus and Grafana, and the setup of alerts for key Ingress metrics. Pre-requisites : A Kubernetes cluster Helm v3 Install Prometheus and Grafana In this step, we will install Prometheus to collect metrics, and Grafana to visualize and create alerts based on those metrics.
